data: On the twenty-second anniversary of Susanna’s birth, old Commendatore Fregi, her guardian, whose charge, by the provisions of her father’s will, on that day terminated, gave a festa in her honour at his villa in Vallanza.

On the twenty-second anniversary of Susanna's birth, old Commendatore Fregi, her guardian, whose charge, by the provisions of her father's will, on that day terminated, gave a festa in her honour at his villa in Vallanza.
